about_the_game:
Sometimes the smallest ideas are the most thoughtful. Fill Multicolor has a very simple premise, you are presented with a grid of dots and you must connect all the dots. Sounds easy? But wait! There are two-color dots that require certain rules inorder to be connected. Dots cannot be connected twice. You must connect all the dots(Obviously). All this combines to make an addictive puzzle game that brightens your brain.

Levels with gradually increasing difficulty

Solve over 1,250+ levels. You can play this addictive puzzle game in various difficulty packs. Each level pack has multiple levels with an increasing challenge. Want the real challenge? Boost your brain by playing the ultimate difficult levels.

How to play

- Fill Multicolor is just like the classic connect the dots game but without numbers or structure to guide you and with a new mechanic concept.

- Start from the initial dot, then connect all open dots on the board ending in the last dot.

- Connections are made vertically or horizontally and without overlap.

- Don’t forget the two-color dots, they are tricky and the new feature that AleC Games added to this kind of dot to dot puzzle games.

- Use hints for puzzles that are too hard to solve. Hints are also free, of course.

- Don’t get too cozy—the puzzles get harder as you go along.

Features

● Minimalist design: beautiful colors, awesome sound effects.

● Smart level design: more than 1250 handcrafted smart levels.

● 22 Awesome dots design.

● You can play Fill Multicolor by AleC Games on your phone and tablet.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Fill Multicolor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A relaxing, minimalist and challenging puzzle game.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
